Package org.hibernate.shards

Copyright (C) 2007 Google Inc.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
HasShardIdList Interface for objects that can provide a List of ShardIds.
Shard Interface representing a Shard.
ShardedTransaction Simple interface to represent a shard-aware Transaction.
ShardOperation<T> Simple interface used to reference something we can do against a Shard.
 

Class Summary
BaseHasShardIdList Base implementation for HasShadIdList.
ShardedConfiguration Like regular Hibernate's Configuration, this class helps construct your factories.
ShardId Uniquely identifies a virtual shard.
ShardImpl Concrete implementation of the Shard interface.
 

Exception Summary
CrossShardAssociationException Exception thrown when someone attempts to create a cross-shard association.
